mapper.select: select id, TXID, TXSTATE, FAILTYPE, FUNDSSTATE, AMOUNT, CURRENCY, ACCOUNTHOLDER, CHANNEL, TAG, MERCHANTTXID, MCONTRACT, COUNTRYCODE, SELLINGPOINT, SOLDSERVICE, INITTS, SUCCEEDEDTS, FAILEDTS, INDOUBTTS, FUNDSRECEIVEDTS, FUNDSMISSINGTS, ERRORTEXT, created_time, update_time, file_name, is_processed from tb_ppro_r_transaction_indoubt where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_ppro_r_transaction_indoubt(TXID, TXSTATE, FAILTYPE, FUNDSSTATE, AMOUNT, CURRENCY, ACCOUNTHOLDER, CHANNEL, TAG, MERCHANTTXID, MCONTRACT, COUNTRYCODE, SELLINGPOINT, SOLDSERVICE, INITTS, SUCCEEDEDTS, FAILEDTS, INDOUBTTS, FUNDSRECEIVEDTS, FUNDSMISSINGTS, ERRORTEXT, created_time, update_time, file_name, is_processed) values (#{txid}, #{txstate}, #{failtype}, #{fundsstate}, #{amount}, #{currency}, #{accountholder}, #{channel}, #{tag}, #{merchanttxid}, #{mcontract}, #{countrycode}, #{sellingpoint}, #{soldservice}, #{initts}, #{succeededts}, #{failedts}, #{indoubtts}, #{fundsreceivedts}, #{fundsmissingts}, #{errortext}, #{createdTime}, #{updateTime}, #{fileName}, #{isProcessed})

insert into tb_ppro_r_transaction_indoubt(TXID, TXSTATE, FAILTYPE, FUNDSSTATE, AMOUNT, CURRENCY, ACCOUNTHOLDER, CHANNEL, TAG, MERCHANTTXID, MCONTRACT, COUNTRYCODE, SELLINGPOINT, SOLDSERVICE, INITTS, SUCCEEDEDTS, FAILEDTS, INDOUBTTS, FUNDSRECEIVEDTS, FUNDSMISSINGTS, ERRORTEXT, created_time, update_time, file_name, is_processed) values
(#{entity.txid}, #{entity.txstate}, #{entity.failtype}, #{entity.fundsstate}, #{entity.amount}, #{entity.currency}, #{entity.accountholder}, #{entity.channel}, #{entity.tag}, #{entity.merchanttxid}, #{entity.mcontract}, #{entity.countrycode}, #{entity.sellingpoint}, #{entity.soldservice}, #{entity.initts}, #{entity.succeededts}, #{entity.failedts}, #{entity.indoubtts}, #{entity.fundsreceivedts}, #{entity.fundsmissingts}, #{entity.errortext}, #{entity.createdTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.fileName}, #{entity.isProcessed})

insert into tb_ppro_r_transaction_indoubt(TXID, TXSTATE, FAILTYPE, FUNDSSTATE, AMOUNT, CURRENCY, ACCOUNTHOLDER, CHANNEL, TAG, MERCHANTTXID, MCONTRACT, COUNTRYCODE, SELLINGPOINT, SOLDSERVICE, INITTS, SUCCEEDEDTS, FAILEDTS, INDOUBTTS, FUNDSRECEIVEDTS, FUNDSMISSINGTS, ERRORTEXT, created_time, update_time, file_name, is_processed) values
(#{entity.txid}, #{entity.txstate}, #{entity.failtype}, #{entity.fundsstate}, #{entity.amount}, #{entity.currency}, #{entity.accountholder}, #{entity.channel}, #{entity.tag}, #{entity.merchanttxid}, #{entity.mcontract}, #{entity.countrycode}, #{entity.sellingpoint}, #{entity.soldservice}, #{entity.initts}, #{entity.succeededts}, #{entity.failedts}, #{entity.indoubtts}, #{entity.fundsreceivedts}, #{entity.fundsmissingts}, #{entity.errortext}, #{entity.createdTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.fileName}, #{entity.isProcessed})
on duplicate key update TXID = values(TXID), TXSTATE = values(TXSTATE), FAILTYPE = values(FAILTYPE), FUNDSSTATE = values(FUNDSSTATE), AMOUNT = values(AMOUNT), CURRENCY = values(CURRENCY), ACCOUNTHOLDER = values(ACCOUNTHOLDER), CHANNEL = values(CHANNEL), TAG = values(TAG), MERCHANTTXID = values(MERCHANTTXID), MCONTRACT = values(MCONTRACT), COUNTRYCODE = values(COUNTRYCODE), SELLINGPOINT = values(SELLINGPOINT), SOLDSERVICE = values(SOLDSERVICE), INITTS = values(INITTS), SUCCEEDEDTS = values(SUCCEEDEDTS), FAILEDTS = values(FAILEDTS), INDOUBTTS = values(INDOUBTTS), FUNDSRECEIVEDTS = values(FUNDSRECEIVEDTS), FUNDSMISSINGTS = values(FUNDSMISSINGTS), ERRORTEXT = values(ERRORTEXT), created_time = values(created_time), update_time = values(update_time), file_name = values(file_name), is_processed = values(is_processed)
mapper.update:
update tb_ppro_r_transaction_indoubt
TXID = #{txid},
TXSTATE = #{txstate},
FAILTYPE = #{failtype},
FUNDSSTATE = #{fundsstate},
AMOUNT = #{amount},
CURRENCY = #{currency},
ACCOUNTHOLDER = #{accountholder},
CHANNEL = #{channel},
TAG = #{tag},
MERCHANTTXID = #{merchanttxid},
MCONTRACT = #{mcontract},
COUNTRYCODE = #{countrycode},
SELLINGPOINT = #{sellingpoint},
SOLDSERVICE = #{soldservice},
INITTS = #{initts},
SUCCEEDEDTS = #{succeededts},
FAILEDTS = #{failedts},
INDOUBTTS = #{indoubtts},
FUNDSRECEIVEDTS = #{fundsreceivedts},
FUNDSMISSINGTS = #{fundsmissingts},
ERRORTEXT = #{errortext},
created_time = #{createdTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
file_name = #{fileName},
is_processed = #{isProcessed},
where id = #{id}
